Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Theta defensin subunit C (BTD-c; BTD-4 subunit 2; primates, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the alpha-defensin family (Theta subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Forms a cyclic peptide with subunit A (BTD-4). An additional intersubunit disulfide bond is formed.

Literature.Title: Isolation, synthesis, and antimicrobial activities of naturally occurring theta-defensin isoforms from baboon leukocytes.
Literature.Author: Garcia AE, Osapay G, Tran PA, Yuan J, Selsted ME.
